mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_exam (c_id, c_exam_name, c_create_time, c_state) VALUES (#{id},#{name},#{createTime},#{state}) ON duplicate key update c_exam_name = #{name}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_exam WHERE c_id = #{id} and c_state = 0
